page.title: 18Carlton Gala.
page.content: Carleton Gala is an annual event which takes place in June on Carlton Green. The money which is raised goes to the local parish church.There are stalls such as a refreshment stall a tombola and a raffle. There are also other events such as races and dancing.Mrs Cornwell's school of ballet dancing take part.The children range from first years to fifth years.They perform various dances and exercises. .Inglebrook school do a gymnastic display.Our school Carleton Park dance the may pole.The may pole is a high pole with different coloured ribbons attached to the top.We hold the ribbons and dance round weaving in and out.The ribbons plait together round the pole.We do three dances,The Barber's pole,Weaving and the spiders web. Lucy Brown.
